alert.note: Alert for Rapides (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 4:24AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Rapides Parish through 500 AM CST... At 424 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Glenmora, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Glenmora, Lecompte, Echo, Poland, Ruby, Woodworth, Forest Hill and Mcnary. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 62 and 74. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
